title: WTB Bill Dahlen (Boston) T206 SGC 10 or 20
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB Bill Dahlen (Boston) T206 SGC 10 or 20
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott T
"REAL" PART OF MESSAGE

If you have an SGC 10 or 20 T206 Bill Dahlen (Boston) that you are looking to sell, please let me know.


"YOU LIVE, YOU LEARN" PART OF MESSAGE

I made a major mistake in my T206 inventory and mislabeled the rarer Brooklyn version as the Boston version.  (The one I have even has an Old Mill back!)  In the past I had bought a GAI slabbed Dahlen (Brooklyn) only to have it revealed as "color added" when I tried to cross it over to SGC.  Just recently I bought an SGC 10 Dahlen (Brooklyn) on the B/S/T board.

Fortunately, that has been the biggest mistake I have made with the T206 set.

Scott

posts.post_title: WTB Bill Dahlen (Boston) T206 SGC 10 or 20
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike (18colt)
Good evening, Scott.

I'm not sure if there's an e-mail problem or if you're out of town and cannot respond to the messages I've sent you this week about this.  Please e-mail me about Dahlen.  

Thanks.

Mike (18colt)
